highlights: Network architecture - set-up and administering of Switches, Routers, Firewalls and Load Balancing Systems, with strong experience using Cisco products
Firewall administration - using most NGFW features, in addition to traditional administration with strong experience using Sophos and Fortigate products
Windows Domains - Administering various Windows Server Roles according to best practices
E-mail systems - Basic administering and troubleshooting of Windows and Linux mail servers
Virtualization - Administration of VMWare virtualization products, including ESXi and vCenter
Integrated basic CI/CD capabilities for .NET Applications in C++ and C#

projects.name: Large-scale Wireless Network Architecture
projects.description: Designed and implemented network architecture for a company warehouse with several floors, and a dozen AP`s for each floor. Connected different floor switches to central backbone switch with redundant connections, then set-up Wireless Controller and Radiolink connection. Used Spanning-Tree and various other protocols for redundancy, mostly using Ruijie Stack.

projects.name: Backbone switch installation and MPLS set-up
projects.description: Installation of two Nexus switches for a large instutition, using redundant routing and layer-2 protocols. Estabilished connection to several edge locations using Cisco ISR Routers to connect to the MPLS network.

projects.name: Video Chat Application
projects.description: A video calling application that can run both Peer-to-Peer and through a dedicated server.

projects.name: Vision Recognition and Automation for an underwater ROV
projects.description: Won the first place at Teknofest 2019

awards.title: 1st Place at Teknofest Istanbul
awards.summary: With Underwater ROV Team Creatiny, we won 1st place at Teknofest competition Underwater ROV Advanced Category. I developed vision recognition algorithms and did R&D on our own in-house basic LIDAR technology.

awards.title: 2nd Place at AzCloud Hackathon
awards.summary: With our team of 5 we developed an industrial CRM application. Worked on back-end and design.
